item.title: FreeCodeCamp Weather App Walkthrough
item.description: Reference Date Title Author URL 2017 Introduction to APIs and AJAX Epicodus Code School Link N/A jQuery - AJAX Introduction w3schools.com Link What is a Weather App? The Open Weather Map provides free weather data across the globe. Our Weather App is a webpage that can … interface with Open Weather Map API make AJAX requests fetch weather data from the server display weather data What is API & AJAX?

item.title: Generate Log Headers with Browser Console
item.description: I resume my habit of logging down coding activity, and then I see the importance of generating headers. # I. List of days This snippet is an application of what I have learnt from Chapter 2 of《Eloquent JavaScript》. This javaScript snippet gives you a list of days for 100-days-of-code log. code var container = ""; for (i=34; i<65; i++) { container += "### Day " + i + ":" + "\n"; } console.

item.title: Learning `map()` in JavaScript
item.description: Reference Date Title Author URL 2017-05-31 Master Map & Filter, Javascript’s Most Powerful Array Functions Arnav Aggarwal Link 2014-02-24 how do you pass an array as a parameter in a function? Dave McFarland Link Summary This article adopts a specific-to-abstract 4-stage approach to explain array functions. A quasi-map function is developed from multiplying each items in arr by 3.

item.title: First Step to API
item.description: Reference Date Title Author URL 2017-05-31 An Introduction to APIs Brian Cooksey Link << An Introduction to APIs >> by Brian Cooksey This short ebook explains APIs in a clear and manageable way. The author is affiliated with Zapier, a tech firm earning a living on APIs. There are 8 chapters in the book. I will summarize and highlight the keypoints in them one by one.
